events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but it doesn't fit properly. I want to request a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want the refund? This will help us process your request quickly.
My order number is 1234567. The jacket is too small even though I ordered my usual size. I want a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate your refund once you ship the jacket back to us. We will provide a prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label option. Iâ€™ll send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your full refund. It should reflect on your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thanks for your help and fast service!
We are closing this case now, but please feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey about your recent service experience. Your feedback is appreciated.
